DocAttribute.Name: NominalDiameter
DocAttribute.Documentation: The nominal diameter defining the cross-section size of the prestressed part of the tendon.

DocAttribute.Name: CrossSectionArea
DocAttribute.Documentation: The effective cross-section area of the prestressed part of the tendon.

DocAttribute.Name: SheathDiameter
DocAttribute.Documentation: Diameter of the sheeth (duct) around the tendon, if there is one with this type of tendon.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrectPredefinedType
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The inherited attribute _ElementType_ shall be provided if the _PredefinedType_ is set to USERDEFINED.
